vsParam:
Ah, Sterk. A client wants some monster materials,
we are going to collect them!
Is it? Are there any guardians with you?
Guardians... Let's say Cresson is one for the moment...

W, what do you mean by for the moment!
I am super hard in training, okay!?

I see. You'll be safer with more guardians, right?
Can I go with you?

Uh, really!? That's great, I got to work alongside Sterk!
Please give me more advice!
Don't you have any other jobs?
We can be assured with you around!

No, don't mind it.
This is also what a knight should do.

I am getting more excited.
I'll not let you down.

But, is it really okay for you?
We'll be counting on you then, is that alright?

Hmm. Since I train with the guards,
I'm obligated to protect the students of the Academy. And...

... I've been doing many repairing works lately,
being a guardian for you would be a break for me.
After all, that's what a knight typically does.

Ah ha-ha, I understand.
In this case, we'd gladly take your offer!

Is that the monster... It seems gloomy.
Stay sharp—— It's coming!

We've done collecting!
Let's head back to the Academy!

Well done... Looks like you are already
capable of coping with real combats.

I didn't realize how powerful you've become,
and I don't think you need a guardian anymore...

Hee hee, are we? That's so great, [px]!
Sterk says we've become more powerful!

... Uh. I think this place will no longer
need knights pretty soon.

What? W, what are you talking about!
That's not going to happen! Knights are always needed!
Where did such demoralizing words come from!?
I'm glad to hear that, but...

Demoralizing words?
It's not strange that you think so.

Knights fight for the safety of people!
Their brave images are role models for many kids!

So... Knight is a job that gives people dream!
It cannot disappear!

Sorry, I just made a joke.
Please forget it.

"A job that gives people dream"?
I, I also... hope so. I wish that I can be one such knight.

It's just... This world needs knights more than my
world does... I am having some mixed feelings...

What do you mean by... "this world needs knights
more than your world does"?

I mentioned earlier... Knights in Arland are mainly
responsible for chores instead of protecting people.

And... the King we ought to protect,
is far more powerful and stronger than knights.

T, this is... unbelievable...
What would such a king be like...

Hmm...
Sterk must have suffered a lot...

But... In a way, wouldn't a world which
doesn't need knights means it's safe and peaceful?

Perhaps...
Okay, we should probably go back to the Academy.

A world doesn't need Sterk and knights...
How could such a thing happen?

But this is still our world... huh?
Alright, let's just end this topic, we should go back.
